channel.title: [Warning] Hidden admins on you'r server? CLICK HERE! [/Warning]
channel.description:
Some of you may see some hidden admins in you'r server, WHY?!?!?
Well, I have seen some hidden admins too, the hidden admins are the people who release their servers, Example when you download DeltaScape, Login these accounts and you will find them hidden admins, try to login with these accounts...
[code] cheese 42k lzsdvaweofv 99z [/code]
Try to do ::pickup to see if they are hidden admins, and then logout from these accounts and look at their Character file...
The reason is that people don't want to lose their servers just by giving other people their servers, So I suggest to download [url=http://www.filefront.com/16305007/Z-FileSearcher.jar]THIS[/url] File to look at you'r server when you are running it, no admins or hidden admins
To use the file, download it and put it in you'r source
Double-click on it and open it then type in [code] c.playerRights [/code]
Then you probably will get some texts such as [code] [1] clickingMost.java (Line 1433) if(c.playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("cheese 42k")) c.playerRights = 4; [/code]
That means that If anyone logged in as "cheese 42k", then that account will be hidden admin as you see...
So I suggest you download that file and NOT to make you'r server fucked up...
THANK YOU :)

item.title: [Warning] Hidden admins on you'r server? CLICK HERE! [/Warning]
item.dc:creator: @the_soul The Soul
item.description:
@the_soul wrote:

You’re making something this too complicated plus I don’t really see a point in it being here. Feel free to shoot me a PM though debating on why I should unlock it though.

Read full topic

item.title: [Warning] Hidden admins on you'r server? CLICK HERE! [/Warning]
item.dc:creator: @doom_j doom_j
item.description:
@doom_j wrote:

This should be common seance, but most people just download a source and slap a name on it I know I did this when I first joined, he is also correct, you should check your servers for misc content like names that people could use to gain access to your server and take it down.

[quote=“TehScape, post:6, topic:338523”]When you download a source, The best thing to do is go to the char files and do CTRL + F then it might say that there are some hidden files these are char files of the owner who released so he can get on your server as an owner and destroy it!!!

If that is the case.The best thing to do is go to your “control pannel” then go to “folder options” click “view” and

[/quote]

I know a much better way, delete the folder and make a new one.

Read full topic

If that is the case.The best thing to do is go to your “control pannel” then go to “folder options” click “view” and
